TextView.android:text: The process used by an organization decommission and dispose of assets due to ageing or changes in performance and capacity requirements. Disposal proceedings should be immediately initiated to avoid further deterioration of the property initiated to avoid further deterioration of the property and timely disposal will yield benefits in terms of, among others, a higher appraised value and by enabling storage areas available for other purposes.
Open to all buyers of Northern Mindanao

1. Mayor’s/Business Permit
2. DTI/SEC
3. PHILGEPS
4. Tax Clearance
5. Income/Business Tax Return
6. Omnibus sworn statement
3. Provision of depreciation cost and net book value
6. Final updating and signing of IIRUP
7. Approval of head of the disposing entity (HOPE) of his representative and preparation of invitation to bid (ITB)
9. Viewing and inspection of the possible bidders
2. Secures payment of bid bond and bid docs
3. Pay the bid bond and bid docs to the budget office
4.1. Dropping from the book of accounts
5.1. Assist upon hauling of LGU Properties
